forecast.detailedForecast: Haze. Partly cloudy, with a low around 70. South wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze before 8am, then haze and a slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm, then haze and a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 88. Southwest wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5pm. Mostly sunny. High near 84, with temperatures falling to around 82 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tuesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 53, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

forecast.name: Wednesday

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
